title: Fattoush
ingredients: ['2 pitta breads', '8 leaves cos lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces', '2 spring onions, chopped', '1 cucumber, chopped', '3 tomatoes, cut into wedges', 'handful chopped fresh parsley', '1 clove garlic, peeled and chopped', '2 tablespoons sumac powder', '4 tablespoons lemon juice', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', 'small handful chopped fresh mint leaves']
